item.title: How to make an Alexa Skill with Python
item.description: This guide will assume that you have already completed the Alexa Python Tutorial from Amazon. If you have done this then you should have a good handle on how to create new Alexa Skills and Lambda functions. But you probably still have no idea how to write code for an Alexa Skill. The code for “alexa-skills-kit-color-expert-python” is almost unreadable. This tutorial will show you a template with some nice clean readable code.
